trans-unit.source: Contains methods, properties, and events to support navigation.
trans-unit.target: Metódusok, tulajdonságok és navigációs támogatásához eseményeket tartalmazza.

trans-unit.source: NavigationService encapsulates the ability to download content within the context of a browser-style navigation.
trans-unit.target: NavigationService képes letölteni a tartalmat egy böngésző stílusú navigációs kontextusában magában foglalja.

trans-unit.source: Content can be any type of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winfx](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winfx-md.md)] object and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_html](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-html-md.md)] files.
trans-unit.target: A tartalom lehet bármilyen típusú [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winfx](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winfx-md.md)] objektum és [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_html](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-html-md.md)] fájlokat.

trans-unit.source: In general, however, pages are the preferred as the way to package content for navigation (see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>).
trans-unit.target: Általános, azonban oldalai előnyben részesített, a csomag tartalmának navigációs módja (lásd: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>

trans-unit.source: Content can be navigated to by providing an instance of an object and calling an overload of the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> method that accepts an object: - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Object%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> Alternatively, content can be navigated to by passing a relative or absolute [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] to one of the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> method overloads that accepts a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]: - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Uri%29?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName> When content is navigated to by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)], NavigationService will return an object that contains the content.
trans-unit.target: Tartalom is nyílik meg biztosít egy objektum egy példányát, és egy túlterhelése sem hívja a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>módszerrel, amely támogatja az objektum:- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Object%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>lehetőségként tartalom lehet a nyílik meg, úgy, hogy a relatív vagy abszolút [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] egy a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>metódus túlterhelések, amely fogad egy [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]:- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Uri%29?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>Amikor valójában a által [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)], NavigationService fog visszaadni a tartalmat tartalmazó objektum.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Uri%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Object%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The lifetime of a navigation can be tracked through the following events: - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigated> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation>.
trans-unit.target: A navigációs élettartama követhető nyomon a következő eseményeken keresztül:- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigated>- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress>- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed>- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped>- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted>- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigated> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>

trans-unit.source: Not all events are raised each time that a navigation occurs; the set of events that are raised is determined by the type of navigation that occurs (content or content fragment) and how the navigation completes (canceled, stopped, or failed).
trans-unit.target: Nem minden eseményt vált ki minden alkalommal, amikor egy navigációs történik; az előállított eseménycsoportot navigációs (tartalom vagy tartalom töredék) kerül, és hogyan befejeződése esetén a navigációs típusú határozza meg (megszakított, leállítva vagy sikertelen).

trans-unit.source: The following figure illustrates the sequence in which these events are raised: ![Page navigation flow chart](~/add/media/navigationoverviewfigure11.png "Page navigation flow chart") During or after a navigation, NavigationService provides information about the content that is being navigated to, including the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the content being navigated to (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A>), the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the current content (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CurrentSource%2A>), and an object that contains the content that was navigated to (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A>).
trans-unit.target: A következő ábra azt mutatja be a sorozatot, amelyen ezek az események aktiválódnak: ![lap navigációs folyamatábra](~/add/media/navigationoverviewfigure11.png "lap navigációs folyamatábra") során, vagy egy navigálási lépés után NavigationService információkat nyújt azokról a tartalmat, amely van folyamatban nyílik meg, beleértve a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] nyílik meg, hogy a tartalom (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A>), a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] az aktuális tartalom (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CurrentSource%2A>), és olyan objektum, amely a rendszer azután nyit meg, a tartalom (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A>).</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CurrentSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: When content is navigated to, NavigationService records the navigation as an entry in navigation history.
trans-unit.target: A valójában, NavigationService bejegyzésként navigációs előzménylistáján rögzíti.

trans-unit.source: An entry is added to back navigation history when either a new navigation occurs, by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> method, or by navigating to an entry in forward navigation history, by calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Bejegyzés kerül a biztonsági előzménylistáján esetén vagy egy új navigációs meghívásával a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>metódus, vagy navigáljon a bejegyzés az előremutató navigációs előzmények <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A> meghívásával</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>

trans-unit.source: An entry is added to forward navigation history by navigating to an entry in back navigation history, by calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Egy bejegyzést ad hozzá az előremutató navigációs előzményei való bejegyzése hátra előzménylistáján, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A> meghívásával

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoBack%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoForward%2A> report whether there are entries in back and forward navigation history, respectively.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoBack%2A>és <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoForward%2A>jelentést, hogy vannak-hátra bejegyzést, és előre előzménylistáján, illetve.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoForward%2A></xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoBack%2A>

trans-unit.source: Also, the most recent entry in back navigation history can be removed by calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.RemoveBackEntry%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Is a legutóbbi bejegyzés hátsó előzménylistáján <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.RemoveBackEntry%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.RemoveBackEntry%2A> meghívásával lehet eltávolítani

trans-unit.source: By default, NavigationService does not store an instance of a content object in navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Alapértelmezés szerint NavigationService nem tárolja a tartalom objektum egy példányát előzménylistáján.

trans-unit.source: Instead, NavigationService creates a new instance of the content object each time it is navigated to by using navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Ehelyett NavigationService létrehoz egy új példányt a tartalom objektum minden alkalommal, amikor a előzménylistáján használatával nyílik.

trans-unit.source: This behavior is designed to avoid excessive memory consumption when large numbers and large pieces of content are being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: Ez a viselkedés célja, hogy túl sok memória-felhasználás elkerülése sok és nagy méretű tartalom, de vannak folyamatban nyílik meg.

trans-unit.source: Consequently, the state of the content is not remembered from one navigation to the next.
trans-unit.target: Következésképpen a tartalom állapotát a program nem jegyzi egy navigációs sávon a másikra.

trans-unit.source: However, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] provides several techniques by which you can store a piece of state for a piece of content in navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Azonban [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] számos eljárást, amellyel tárolhatja egy adat egy adat tartalom állapota előzménylistáján biztosít.

trans-unit.source: Using <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.AddBackEntry%2A>, you can also remember multiple sets of state for a single page instance.
trans-unit.target: Használatával <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.AddBackEntry%2A>, egylapos példány állapotát több példányban is emlékszik.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.AddBackEntry%2A>

trans-unit.source: NavigationService is `sealed` class and, therefore, cannot be instantiated; instead, NavigationService is used by navigators to enable navigation.
trans-unit.target: NavigationService van `sealed` osztály, és ezért példánya nem hozható létre; ehelyett NavigationService segítségével időkezelőket lehetővé a navigációt.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], there are two navigators: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.
trans-unit.target: A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], nincsenek két időkezelőket: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: Visually, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] use [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] as a navigator, to provide an integrated user experience.
trans-unit.target: Vizuálisan [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] használja [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] , egy navigator egy beépített felhasználói felületet tudjon biztosítani.

trans-unit.source: Physically, however, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] actually use <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> as the navigator; the <xref:System.Windows.Application.MainWindow%2A> property of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] running in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] will return a reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, and the navigation history that is managed by the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> is integrated with the navigation history that is managed by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] in the following ways: - When content is navigated to by calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A> from within an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] the relevant navigation history entries are also added to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Fizikailag, azonban [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] ténylegesen használtakra <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>a Navigátor; a <xref:System.Windows.Application.MainWindow%2A>tulajdonsága egy [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] futó [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] mutató hivatkozás fog visszaadni a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, és a navigációs előzmények által kezelt a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>integrálva van a előzménylistáján által kezelt [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] a következő módon: – ha valójában a meghívásával <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>, és <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A>belül egy [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] is hozzáadja a megfelelő navigációs kérelemelőzmény-bejegyzésekkel [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] előzménylistáján.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> </xref:System.Windows.Application.MainWindow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: - When entries in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] are selected, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] causes NavigationService to navigate back or forwards to the content that is associated with those entries.
trans-unit.target: – Amikor bejegyzéseket a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] navigációs [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] van kiválasztva, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] NavigationService lépjen vissza az okozza, vagy a tételekhez rendelt tartalom továbbítja.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> can provide its own navigation history, or use the navigation history of the navigator that hosts it.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>is biztosítanak a saját előzménylistáján, vagy a előzménylistáján a Navigátor üzemeltető azt.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> provides its own navigation history, it can display its own navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to navigate through the entries in navigation history; those entries are not added to the navigation history of the host navigator (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_iegeneric](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]) and, consequently, cannot be navigated to from the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] of each (see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership%2A>).
trans-unit.target: Ha <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>nyújt a saját előzménylistáján legyen képes megjeleníteni a saját navigációs [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] előzménylistáján; bejegyzések navigálni tételekhez nem lettek hozzáadva a előzménylistáján a gazdagép Navigátor (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_iegeneric](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]), és ezért nem nyílik meg, a navigációs sávon [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] egyes (lásd: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership%2A>).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>

trans-unit.source: Adds an entry to back navigation history that contains a <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Biztonsági másolatot tartalmazó előzménylistáján bejegyzés hozzáadása egy <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"> </xref> objektum.

trans-unit.source: AddBackEntry, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState>, and <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.IProvideCustomContentState> are used to help remember multiple sets of state for the current content.
trans-unit.target: AddBackEntry, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState>, és <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.IProvideCustomContentState>segítségével, ne felejtse az aktuális tartalom több példányban.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.IProvideCustomContentState> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"></xref> object that represents application-defined state that is associated with a specific piece of content.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"> </xref> objektum, amely a tartalom egy adott adat társított alkalmazás által meghatározott állapotát jeleníti meg.

trans-unit.source: state is , and a object isn't returned from .
trans-unit.target: statevan , és egy által visszaadott nem .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether there is at least one entry in back navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Egy érték, amely azt jelzi, hogy van-e legalább egy tételt hátsó előzménylistáján lekérdezi.

trans-unit.source: CanGoBack to determine whether there is at least one entry in back navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Annak meghatározásához, hogy van-e legalább egy tételt hátsó előzménylistáján CanGoBack.

trans-unit.source: This property should be inspected before calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>; if <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A> is called and there are no entries in back navigation history, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Ez a tulajdonság hívása előtt kell megvizsgálni <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>; Ha <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>nevezik, és nincsenek bejegyzések hátsó előzménylistáján, egy <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>vált ki.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > that if navigation history is shared by multiple navigators (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>), the most recent entry in back navigation history may not have been added by the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> for the current navigator.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >, ha előzménylistáján legyen elosztva a több időkezelőket (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>), a legutóbbi bejegyzés hátra előzménylistáján előfordulhat, hogy nem lettek hozzáadva által a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>az aktuális Navigator.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if there is at least one entry in back navigation history; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha legalább egy bejegyzés hátsó előzménylistáján; Ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether there is at least one entry in forward navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Egy érték, amely azt jelzi, hogy van-e legalább egy tételt navigációs előzmények lekérdezi.

trans-unit.source: CanGoForward to determine whether there is at least one entry in forward navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Annak meghatározásához, hogy van-e legalább egy tételt navigációs előzmények CanGoForward.

trans-unit.source: This property should be inspected before calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A>; if <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A> is called and there are no entries in forward navigation history, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Ez a tulajdonság hívása előtt kell megvizsgálni <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A>; Ha <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A>nevezik, és nincsenek bejegyzések az előremutató navigációs előzmények egy <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>vált ki.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if there is at least one entry in forward navigation history; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha legalább egy bejegyzés előre előzménylistáján; Ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a reference to the object that contains the current content.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi vagy beállítja az objektum, amely tartalmazza az aktuális tartalom mutató hivatkozás.

trans-unit.source: Content can be set in one of two ways: - Directly, by setting it to a reference to an object.
trans-unit.target: Tartalom állítható be az alábbi két módszer egyikével: - közvetlenül, úgy, hogy olyan objektumra hivatkozik.

trans-unit.source: - Indirectly, by calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A>.
trans-unit.target: -Közvetve, meghívásával <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A>, vagy <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoForward%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GoBack%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> initiates a new navigation; since navigation is asynchronous, Content won't return a value if it is inspected immediately after being set.
trans-unit.target: Beállítás <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>indít el egy új navigációs; mert navigációs aszinkron, a tartalom nem ad vissza értéket, ha azt közvetlenül a beállítása után a rendszer megvizsgálja.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>

trans-unit.source: An object that is a reference to the object that contains the current content.
trans-unit.target: Olyan objektumot, amely egy az aktuális tartalmat tartalmazó objektum hivatkozását.

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the content that was last navigated to.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] a tartalom, amely utoljára lett nyílik meg.

trans-unit.source: The value of the CurrentSource property is not changed until navigation to a different [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] has completed successfully.
trans-unit.target: A CurrentSource tulajdonság értéke nem módosul, amíg egy másik navigációs [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] sikeresen befejeződött.

trans-unit.source: CurrentSource can be set with a fragment-only [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: CurrentSource egy töredék csak az állítható [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Uri> for the content that was last navigated to, if navigated to by using a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Uri>volt utoljára nyílik meg, ha azután nyit meg, hogy a tartalom egy [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]; ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when navigation to a content fragment begins, which occurs immediately, if the desired fragment is in the current content, or after the source [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] content has been loaded, if the desired fragment is in different content.
trans-unit.target: Akkor következik be, amikor a tartalom töredékkel navigációs kezdődik, amely következik be, ha a kívánt töredéke a jelenlegi tartalmat, vagy a forrás után [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] tartalom betöltése megtörtént, ha a kívánt töredéke eltérő tartalomra.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService"></xref> for the navigator whose content contains the specified <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekér egy hivatkozást a <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService"> </xref> a tartalmazza, amelyek tartalmát a megadott Navigator <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A navigator has a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> that handles content navigation.
trans-unit.target: A Navigátor rendelkezik egy <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>, amely kezeli a tartalom navigációs.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] has two navigators: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]rendelkezik két időkezelőket: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>és <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: To process navigation requests and manage navigation lifetime, a navigator uses the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] navigation service, which is implemented as the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> class.
trans-unit.target: Navigációs kérelmek feldolgozását és navigációs élettartama kezelése, a Navigátor használja a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] navigációs szolgáltatást, amely valósul meg a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>osztályhoz.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>

trans-unit.source: Content that is hosted by a navigator can get a reference to the navigator's <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> by calling the GetNavigationService method.
trans-unit.target: A navigátor által szolgáltatott tartalom kérheti le a Navigátor mutató hivatkozás <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>GetNavigationService metódus meghívásával.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>

trans-unit.source: GetNavigationService returns `null` when the `dependencyObject`: - Is a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>.
trans-unit.target: GetNavigationService adja vissza `null` amikor a `dependencyObject`:- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> van

trans-unit.source: - Is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> that: 1.
trans-unit.target: -Van egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>, amely: 1.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>

trans-unit.source: Is hosted by another navigator.
trans-unit.target: Egy másik navigator üzemelteti.

trans-unit.source: Has its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership> tulajdonsága</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership%2A> van

trans-unit.source: - Is not part of content that is hosted by a navigator.
trans-unit.target: -A nem a navigátor által szolgáltatott tartalom egy részét képezi.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] offers two shortcuts for acquiring a reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>: - The <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> that processed the navigation to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> can be accessed from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> itself by getting the value of its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.NavigationService%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]két parancsikon beszerzése egy hivatkozást kínál a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>: - a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>való navigálás feldolgozott, amely egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>érhetők el a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>maga által értékének kiolvasásakor a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.NavigationService%2A?displayProperty=fullName>tulajdonság.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.NavigationService%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> that is used by a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> to process navigation can be accessed by getting the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationService%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>által használt egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>navigációs feldolgozni hozzáférhet a értékének lekérését a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationService%2A>tulajdonság.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationService%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"></xref> in content that is hosted by a navigator.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"> </xref> a navigátor által szolgáltatott tartalom található.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService"></xref> for the navigator whose content contains the specified <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"></xref>; can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> in some cases (see Remarks).
trans-unit.target: Egy hivatkozást a <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService"> </xref> a tartalmazza, amelyek tartalmát a megadott Navigator <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"> </xref>; lehet <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> bizonyos esetekben (lásd: ().

trans-unit.source: The dependencyObject parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The dependencyObject parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Navigates to the most recent entry in back navigation history, if there is one.
trans-unit.target: Ugrás a legutóbbi bejegyzés hátra előzménylistáján, ha van ilyen.

trans-unit.source: Before calling GoBack, the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoBack%2A> property can be inspected to determine whether there are entries in back navigation history.
trans-unit.target: GoBack, hívása előtt a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoBack%2A>tulajdonság ellenőrizni kell meghatározni, hogy vannak-e bejegyzések hátsó előzménylistáján.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoBack%2A>

trans-unit.source: GoBack is called when there are no entries in back navigation history.
trans-unit.target: GoBack nevezzük, amikor nincsenek bejegyzések hátsó előzménylistáján.

trans-unit.source: Navigate to the most recent entry in forward navigation history, if there is one.
trans-unit.target: Nyissa meg a legutóbbi bejegyzés előre előzménylistáján, ha van ilyen.

trans-unit.source: Before calling GoForward, the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoForward%2A> property can be inspected to determine whether there are entries in forward navigation history.
trans-unit.target: GoForward, hívása előtt a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoForward%2A>tulajdonság ellenőrizni kell meghatározni, hogy vannak-e bejegyzések az előremutató navigációs előzményekben.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoForward%2A>

trans-unit.source: GoForward is called when there are no entries in forward navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Ha nincsenek bejegyzések az előremutató navigációs előzmények GoForward neve.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when content that was navigated to has been loaded, parsed, and has begun rendering.
trans-unit.target: Rendszer azután nyit meg, tartalom betöltése megtörtént, elemzése, és a megjelenítési kezdődött következik be.

trans-unit.source: You handle LoadCompleted if you need to discover pertinent information regarding the navigation request upon load completion.
trans-unit.target: Ha szeretné felderíteni a betöltés befejezése után a navigációs kérés vonatkozó információt LoadCompleted kezeli.

trans-unit.source: This information is available from the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs> object that is passed to the LoadCompleted event handler, and includes: - The content and its [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Ez az információ áll rendelkezésre a a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs>LoadCompleted eseménykezelőjét számára, és a tartalmazó objektum:-a tartalom és a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: - The navigator (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>).
trans-unit.target: -A Navigátor (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: - Additional data, if the navigation was initiated by calling either <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: -További adatokhoz, ha a navigációs kezdeményezte vagy hívása <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>vagy <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Response details (using a <xref:System.Net.WebResponse> object).
trans-unit.target: -Válasz adatai (használatával egy <xref:System.Net.WebResponse>objektum).</xref:System.Net.WebResponse>

trans-unit.source: LoadCompleted is not raised when the source page could not be found or loaded, in which case <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed> is raised.
trans-unit.target: LoadCompleted nem jelenik meg, ha a forrás oldalon nem található vagy nem betöltött, ebben az esetben <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed>következik be.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> raises LoadCompleted, it also raises <xref:System.Windows.Application.LoadCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> event on the <xref:System.Windows.Application> object.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Amikor <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>LoadCompleted, riasztást is riasztást <xref:System.Windows.Application.LoadCompleted?displayProperty=fullName>azonosítójú esemény a <xref:System.Windows.Application>objektum.</xref:System.Windows.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Application.LoadCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.

trans-unit.source: Navigate asynchronously to content that is contained by an object.
trans-unit.target: Nyissa meg aszinkron módon tartalom objektum által tartalmazott.

trans-unit.source: Navigate will navigate to the <xref:System.Object> specified by `root` if the following conditions are true: - The <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating> event is not cancelled.
trans-unit.target: Keresse meg a rendszer navigáljon a <xref:System.Object>által megadott `root` a következő feltételek teljesülése esetén: - a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>esemény nem meg lett szakítva.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: - A web request (see <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>) can be created.
trans-unit.target: -A webes kérelem (lásd: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>) hozhatók létre.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>

trans-unit.source: If `root` is `null`, the existing content (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A>) is cleared.
trans-unit.target: Ha `root` van `null`, a meglévő tartalmat (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A>) törlődik.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When downloading Web content, you may receive a Web exception (for example, 404: File Not Found).
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Webes tartalom letöltésekor jelenhet meg egy webes kivétel (például 404: a fájl nem található).

trans-unit.source: You can handle such exceptions from <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed>.
trans-unit.target: Az ilyen kivételek a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed> kezelése

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the content to navigate to.
trans-unit.target: Keresse meg a tartalmat tartalmazó objektum.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a navigation is not canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha nem törli a navigáció; Ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Navigate asynchronously to content that is specified by a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Megadott tartalom aszinkron módon navigáljon a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The value of `source` can be a Web [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_url](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-url-md.md)] or a valid pack [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] (see [Pack URIs in WPF](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)).
trans-unit.target: Értékének `source` lehet egy webes [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_url](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-url-md.md)] vagy egy érvényes csomagban [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] (lásd: [Pack URI-azonosítók a WPF](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)).

trans-unit.source: Navigate will navigate to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] specified by `source` if the following conditions are true: - The <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating> event is not cancelled.
trans-unit.target: Keresse meg a rendszer navigáljon a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] által megadott `source` a következő feltételek teljesülése esetén: - a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>esemény nem meg lett szakítva.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>

trans-unit.source: - A web request (see <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>) can be created.
trans-unit.target: -A webes kérelem (lásd: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>) hozhatók létre.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating>

trans-unit.source: If `source` is `null`, the existing content (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A>) is cleared.
trans-unit.target: Ha `source` van `null`, a meglévő tartalmat (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A>) törlődik.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When downloading Web content, you may receive a Web exception (for example, 404: File Not Found).
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Webes tartalom letöltésekor jelenhet meg egy webes kivétel (például 404: a fájl nem található).

trans-unit.source: You can handle such exceptions from <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed>.
trans-unit.target: Az ilyen kivételek a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed> kezelése

trans-unit.source: You can use Navigate to navigate to a content fragment.
trans-unit.target: Navigálás segítségével keresse meg a tartalom töredéket.

trans-unit.source: If the content identified by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] is the current content, it is not downloaded again.
trans-unit.target: Ha a tartalom azonosíthatók a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] van az aktuális nem újra letöltve tartalom.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Uri> object initialized with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the desired content.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Uri>objektum inicializálása során a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] kívánt tartalom.</xref:System.Uri>
